TopicTitle: Will Squad ever make another Kerbal Game?

Articles.Content: Will Squad Ever make another Kerbal themed game? that would be . I mean A full on game, no DLC stuff. What I mean is Maybe a sandbox or Sims style game based on Kerbin and kerbals?
This question gets asked quite a bit, but I don't think anyone has a concrete answer besides "Squad hasn't said anything."
Dude, that's MY last name, also, thanks.
I thought about this for a while, it would be cool, but i dont think Squad has the time and money to make yet another game in this period of time. Maybe in the 2020s or so.
I heard Squad is making a new development.
I strongly doubt it. Not to say they wouldn't make another game, but it's the 'Kerbal theme' I'm doubtful about.

Better question: Will Squad actually finish their first Kerbal themed game?

Edited December 18, 2016 by Tex_NL
What should a 2nd KSP be good for? As Squad I'd rather stick to KSP and crank out a couple DLC's to improve the original game and make some money.
I don't think so. To me it looks more like Squad will pull a Persson and sell the franchise for as much as they can, then retire to Patagonia and live like kings.
Better question: Will Squad make an NEW game after Kerbal space program
No. This game should be a one in a million. I just hope that if they release DLC it isn't going to be like how Paradox Interactive does DLCs.
